Associate Covariates

associate_covariate.Rd

Associate environmental covariates to effort table, based on monthly raster store in unique folder.

Usage

associate_covariate(
  effort_table,
  raster_folder,
  temporal = "month",
  check_sources = FALSE
)

Arguments

effort_table

sf dataframe. SF object produce in the pelascope workflow.

raster_folder

path. Path leading to folder with monthly raster.

temporal

character. "month", "week or "day". Inform the temporal definition set in the rasters.

check_sources

boolean. Use to check sources for each effort raw. Add a column with raster of origin.

Value

effort table with covariates

Examples



list_file_tif <- system.file(package = "pelascope", "tif_covariables")

associate_covariate(effort_table = pelascope::data_effort_with_sightings,
                    raster_folder = list_file_tif,
                    temporal = "month", 
                    check_sources = FALSE)
